title: CC Agents
subtitle: Manage your Claude Code agents

labels.update_agent_config: Update your Claude Code agent configuration
labels.configure_new_agent: Configure a new Claude Code agent

opus.name: Claude 4 Opus
opus.description: More capable, better for complex tasks

messages.create_first_agent: Create your first CC Agent to get started
messages.unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
messages.agent_running_warning:
An agent is currently running. If you navigate away, the agent will continue running in the background. You can view running sessions in the 'Running Sessions' tab within CC Agents.

Do you want to continue?
messages.enter_task: Enter a task to run the agent
messages.failed_to_stop: Failed to stop agent - it may have already completed

placeholders.default_task: e.g., Review this code for security issues
placeholders.task_input: What would you like the agent to do?

execution.title: Agent Execution
execution.configure_hooks_description: Configure hooks that run before, during, and after tool executions
execution.project_hooks_info: Project hooks are stored in .claude/settings.json and are committed to version control, allowing team members to share configurations.
execution.local_hooks_info: Local hooks are stored in .claude/settings.local.json and are not committed to version control, perfect for personal preferences.

delete_dialog.title: Delete Agent
delete_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the agent "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the agent and all its associated data.

system_prompt_description: Define the behavior and capabilities of your Claude Code agent
default_task_description: This will be used as the default task placeholder when executing the agent

modal.title: Agent Management
modal.description: Create new agents or manage running agent executions
modal.create_first: Create your first agent to get started
modal.running_appear_here: Agent executions will appear here when started
